VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.label: The Great Hierarchy
VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.description: This screen allows you to view all members of the Empire faction. You can spend honor to invite them as visitors.

VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.label: Permits
VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.description: This screen allows you to customize and select permits for each of your noble people.

VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.label: Vassalage
VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.description: This screen allows you to vassalize nearby Imperial bases to gain regular tithes from them.

VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.label: Honors
VFEEmpire.RoyaltyTabDef.description: This screen allows you to apply previously unlocked honorable titles to your colonists, providing them with unique but very specific perks.
